author: Get News
title: Nest and Care Reaffirms Its Dedication to Leading Bethesda Senior Care | User | dailytimesleader.com
text:
Nest and Care, a premier Bethesda, MD senior care provider, reaffirms its commitment to high-quality, compassionate home care for the elderly. Offering personalized care plans, their services range from daily living assistance to specialized care, ensuring seniors' health, happiness, and independence. Trust Nest and Care for your loved one's needs. Google it at https://nestandcare.com for more information. Bethesda, MD - Nest and Care, a pivotal provider of senior care services in Bethesda, MD, is proud to announce its ongoing commitment to offering the highest-quality home care for the elderly community. Recognized for its exceptional service and dedication to enhancing the lives of seniors, Nest and Care ensures that families in Bethesda have access to reliable, compassionate care for their loved ones.
"At Nest and Care, we understand the importance of providing a supportive and caring environment for our seniors," said Kat Villanueva, owner of Nest and Care. "Our mission is to deliver personalized care that meets the unique needs of each individual, promoting their health, happiness, and independence. We are devoted to being Bethesda's trusted home care provider, continually adapting and improving our services to meet the evolving needs of our community."
Nest and Care's range of services encompasses everything from basic assistance with daily living activities to more specialized care for those with chronic conditions or recovering from illness or surgery. By focusing on comprehensive and personalized care plans, Nest and Care's professional caregivers are equipped to address seniors' physical, emotional, and social needs, ensuring a higher quality of life and peace of mind for clients and their families.
For more information about Nest and Care and their Bethesda senior care, please visit their website at https://nestandcare.com
About Nest and Care:
Nest and Care is a leading provider of home care services in Bethesda, MD, dedicated to improving the lives of seniors through high-quality, compassionate care. With a team of highly trained and dedicated caregivers, Nest and Care offers a wide range of personalized home care solutions designed to meet the diverse needs of the elderly community. Committed to excellence, Nest and Care continues to set the standard for senior care in Bethesda and beyond.
Media Contact
Company Name: Nest And Care
Contact Person: Kat Villanueva
Email: Send Email
Phone: +1 213 448 9798
Address: Capital Beltway Building, 1751 Elton Rd #210
City: Silver Spring
State: MD
Country: United States
Website: https://nestandcare.com

author: Rebecaa
title: Re: Issue with Google nest hub
text:
Monday
I am having an issue with my speaker I ask it to play a specific radio station and it won‚Äôt play it started about a week ago
the specific radio station I want it to play is ‚Äú105.1 knci‚Äù which is a local country radio station and it jut won‚Äôt work I have already tried re setting the devices and still not working it also did this wit other radio stations. is their a way to fix this because I mainly use it to listen to to the radio I hate to have to look in to getting some other devices
, it starts to load, fails, and shows a generic audacy icon.
any one have some sort of of solution to this
Monday
I have the same issue. Very frustrating
Monday
I have the same problem with 3aw and 6pr radio. But plays other stations. Since Friday this has been the problem
Monday
Radioapp doesn't play any station. Started about 4 days ago. Works on my other google devices just not my nest hub.
yesterday
I have the same problem and it is very annoying. It was even mentioned on 2GB this morning. I have contacted Google as 2GB stated they will follow up and as well, I also emailed the RadioApp people direct ( it's Australian ), to no avail. as of this stage. Resetting the Google Nest device of storage & cache does not clear the problem.
I would point out I have no trouble streaming Radio with Amazon Alexa devices at this point.
yesterday
I resetted all my google nests and none work on 3aw 2gb 6pr.seems to be the only stations that don‚Äôt work on mine. I listen to sen Melbourne and Perth sen and no problems.
thanks for your info and I hope they can fix it.
12m ago
11m ago
3 hours ago
Hello to all on this thread.
This turns out to be most likely a worldwide Google firmware issue.
Lots of info and discussion on workarounds and fixes that appear to being rolled out in the UK.
https://www.googlenestcommunity.com/t5/Speakers-and-Displays/RadioApp-no-loading-on-Google-Nest-Hub-...
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Cindy A. Morales Castillo
title: Papa Francisco: momentos en los que ha ayudado a la paz de Colombia, cese al fuego con el ELN y FARC | EL ESPECTADOR
text: El papa Francisco ha sido uno de los m√°s firmes defensores de la paz de Colombia, por lo que no sorprende que ese fuera el tema principal en el encuentro que tuvo el viernes con el presidente Gustavo Petro. El anuncio principal fue la postulaci√≥n que el mandatario hizo para que el Estado del Vaticano pueda ser sede de una de las rondas de negociaciones que el Gobierno lleva con el ELN. Todav√≠a no se sabe si esa postulaci√≥n pueda ser o no posible, especialmente porque desde la delegaci√≥n del Gobierno en ese proceso se ha insistido en que la mesa de di√°logos debe trasladarse a Colombia. Pero la idea est√° sustentada en que tanto Colombia como los esfuerzos de paz de diferentes gobiernos han estado presentes en la agenda del papa, incluso desde antes de la firma del Acuerdo de Paz de 2016. En contexto: ¬øEs viable que el Vaticano sea sede de una de las rondas de di√°logos con el ELN? Adem√°s, esa guerrilla ‚Äîque est√° a punto de cumplir 60 a√±os de fundaci√≥n‚Äî tiene en sus ra√≠ces una profunda influencia religiosa. El ELN tiene en su ADN la herencia de la Revoluci√≥n Cubana y la participaci√≥n del cura colombiano Camilo Torres ‚Äîy la teolog√≠a de la liberaci√≥n del que era exponente‚Äî conjur√≥ la uni√≥n entre la religi√≥n y las ideas marxistas. En las √∫ltimas semanas, Colombia hab√≠a estado entre las oraciones del pont√≠fice. El domingo pasado rez√≥ por las 36 personas que murieron en el derrumbe en Choc√≥ y el 7 de enero, durante el rezo dominical del √Ångelus, el papa pidi√≥ la liberaci√≥n de todos los secuestrados del pa√≠s. ‚ÄúLos invito a unirse a mi plegaria para la liberaci√≥n sin condiciones de todas las personas actualmente secuestradas en Colombia‚Äù, dijo. Las palabras se dieron justo despu√©s de que el ELN y la disidencia de las antiguas FARC, conocida como Estado Mayor Central (EMC), anunciaran la suspensi√≥n de los secuestros con fines extorsivos, pero tambi√©n cuando se confirmaba el secuestro de Jefferson Murillo, registrador delegado en Choc√≥, y del que desde el pasado 6 de enero se desconoce su paradero. Un mes antes, el 14 de diciembre, sostuvo una reuni√≥n con la vicepresidenta Francia M√°rquez, tambi√©n en el Vaticano, en la que habl√≥ de la paz y de la reparaci√≥n de v√≠ctimas del conflicto afrodescendientes e ind√≠genas. ‚ÄúLe manda a Colombia un mensaje de amor, alegr√≠a y esperanza‚Äù, dijo M√°rquez, quien agreg√≥ que ‚Äúnos invita a seguir trabajando de manera incansable por lograr la paz, la justicia social y la dignidad para todos los colombianos y colombianas‚Äù. Adem√°s: As√≠ naci√≥ el Eln, la √∫ltima guerrilla de Colombia, que hoy negocia la paz El papa Francisco, primer latinoamericano en conseguir esa dignidad, es tambi√©n una figura importante para el ELN. Fue por el pont√≠fice que se logr√≥ uno de los hitos m√°s relevantes con esa guerrilla: el cese al fuego de 101 d√≠as, que entr√≥ en vigor el 1¬∞ de octubre de 2017, durante el gobierno de Juan Manuel Santos. Era la primera vez en 54 a√±os de conflicto que se daba un hecho de esa magnitud, que fue descrito como el ‚Äúprimer milagro del papa‚Äù. Esa acci√≥n, que ya se sobrepas√≥ con el alto al fuego de 180 d√≠as que esa guerrilla lleva con este Gobierno, estuvo motivada por el viaje que hizo el papa a Colombia, pero con un trasfondo a√∫n m√°s especial y que mostr√≥ su inter√©s por el pa√≠s. Esa visita fue parte de la promesa que hizo si se firmaba el Acuerdo de Paz con las FARC. ‚ÄúPrometo que cuando el Acuerdo sea blindado por el plebiscito y por el acompa√±amiento internacional ir√© a Colombia a ense√±ar sobre paz‚Äù, asegur√≥ el m√°ximo jerarca cat√≥lico. En su momento, el Gobierno reconoci√≥ que esa visita hab√≠a sido fundamental para adelantar el cese. ‚ÄúEl mensaje del papa ha llegado profundamente a la mesa de negociaciones, desde hace dos meses estamos hablando de ello‚Äù, se√±al√≥ Juan Camilo Restrepo, entonces jefe negociador del Gobierno. Despu√©s de eso, el papa Francisco nombr√≥ a su amigo personal Luis Mariano Montemayor como nuncio apost√≥lico en Colombia, es decir, como su representante en el pa√≠s, cargo que tuvo hasta el a√±o pasado. Le puede interesar: Las pullas del Gobierno Petro al ELN a pocos d√≠as del nuevo ciclo de di√°logos en Cuba La misi√≥n que le encarg√≥ el sumo pont√≠fice a Montemayor fue clara: ‚ÄúLe repetir√© las mismas palabras que √©l me dijo: ‚ÄòMe he empe√±ado por la paz en Colombia y sigo empe√±ado en la paz de Colombia‚Äô. Esa es mi misi√≥n, venir aqu√≠, no a decirles a los colombianos qu√© hacer, sino acompa√±arlos y ayudarlos a que encuentren‚Äù, afirm√≥ a este diario en junio de 2019. En esa misma entrevista, monse√±or Montemayor dijo que ten√≠a contactos directos con el ELN, que les hab√≠a hecho la exigencia de dejar el secuestro y que estaba dispuesto a ser un facilitador en ese di√°logo. Adem√°s, monse√±or Montemayor fue una de las personas que participaron en 2021 en acercamientos entre el ELN y el gobierno de Iv√°n Duque para tratar de destrabar el proceso tras el atentado perpetrado por esa guerrilla, el 17 de enero de 2019, en la Escuela General Santander en Bogot√° y donde murieron 22 personas. Durante todo 2021, las reuniones convocadas se hicieron en la oficina de la Nunciatura y fueron convocadas por el mismo monse√±or Montemayor, el padre Dar√≠o Echeverri, secretario de la Comisi√≥n de Conciliaci√≥n Nacional; Carlos Ruiz, jefe de la Misi√≥n de Verificaci√≥n de la ONU, y Ra√∫l Rosende, jefe adjunto de esa oficina de la ONU. Otras acciones del papa incluyeron incluso mediar entre la pelea de los expresidentes Juan Manuel Santos y √Ålvaro Uribe, que se hab√≠a hecho a√∫n m√°s dura tras la votaci√≥n de 2016 del plebiscito por el Acuerdo de Paz, en el que gan√≥ el No. En diciembre de ese a√±o el jerarca los congreg√≥ en la Santa Sede para su reconciliaci√≥n. El resultado no fue milagroso, y ambos l√≠deres profundizaron sus diferencias. El pont√≠fice ya hab√≠a tenido otro encuentro con Petro en febrero de 2022, cuando era candidato presidencial. En esa reuni√≥n conversaron sobre la b√∫squeda de una soluci√≥n a la violencia en Colombia. Con la reciente visita de Petro, la primera que hace como mandatario, se afianza el apoyo de la Iglesia cat√≥lica a la paz del pa√≠s. Bien sea por su sangre latinoamericana o por la convicci√≥n propia de su dignidad como el m√°ximo jerarca de la Iglesia cat√≥lica, o por una mezcla de ambas cosas, el papa Francisco es y ha sido un aliado en la b√∫squeda de la paz de Colombia.

author: Woman's Day team
title: Meet the Aussie mum saving you cash!
text:
Jen Hanlon might be best known to her thousands of fans as Jennnnaaayy, but the straight-talking mum is quick to explain how she always hated her nickname growing up.
"It's funny because when [the movie] Forrest Gump came out I was in high school. I used to get called Jennnnaaayy all the time, and I hated it," she tells Woman's Day, referring to how Tom Hanks' character pronounced the name of his love interest. "But now it's become my persona ‚Äì it's like I dealt with that in my own way and I'm using it for good."
Jen stumbled across her content creation role after downloading TikTok during the 2020 lockdowns so she could copy the viral dances posted there with her family.
While housebound one day, she decided to share a couple of her
low-costmeals online to help people feeling the pinch of rising prices, never expecting her tasty creations to go viral.
"It was so weird but really fun all at once," she remembers. "It's crazy how all it takes is one video to go viral that opens you up to reaching so many people."
She now has nearly 600,000 followers and almost 24 million likes since she started sharing clips almost four years ago.
"My path has changed so much and I guess I just rode the wave," says 39-year-old Jen. "It's definitely given us opportunities we never had before."
While Jen says her mechanic husband Joe and son Sam, 16, were initially shocked by her rise to fame, the pair are very supportive and occasionally post videos themselves to see who can gain more followers.
"At first, Sam was a bit concerned, and then I was worried I would embarrass him, but now he is completely on board," explains Jen from Singleton, NSW. "When I get invited to events, Joe always comes with me."
As well as sharing her passion for cooking, Jen is very open about talking about her dark times. During COVID, she invited followers to have lunch with her online and still offers #checkinwithjen and #teawithjen sessions to help anyone experiencing loneliness. She also talks frankly about her own experience with infertility and depression.
"Until you experience depression yourself, you don't understand the depths of it and how dark life can get," Jen explains.
"I was lucky enough to have supportive people around me who encouraged me to get help."
Now the summer holidays are in full swing, Jen is hoping to help anyone feeling the pinch. She has weekly $100 family meal plans available for anyone to use as inspiration on her website, but she admits that her much-loved $10 meals are now often around $15, thanks to inflation.
"Listen to your local radio station or check community noticeboards for events and activities that won't cost a fortune," Jen says about surviving the holidays. "And when you go out, take your food with you. Look at what's in your pantry and think about what you can do with it."
While life is hectic working full-time as an office manager and producing new social media content, Jen says the positive feedback she receives makes the juggle worthwhile.
"It was and still is very surreal," she says of being recognised. "I have imposter syndrome most days but I love talking to people, so I enjoy that aspect of it."
Her family, friends and colleagues keep her down-to-earth.
"They all just still see me as Jen, I'm sure, not Jennnnaaayy," she says.
"I do know though they enjoy the muffins, cakes and slices that I bring in when I've made them for content and need to get them out of my house so I don't eat them all!"

ÂÖ®ÂøóÁßëÊäÄÊâÄÂ±ûÁî≥‰∏áË°å‰∏ö‰∏∫ÔºöÁîµÂ≠ê-ÂçäÂØº‰Ωì-Êï∞Â≠óËäØÁâáËÆæËÆ°„ÄÇÊâÄÂ±ûÊ¶ÇÂøµÊùøÂùóÂåÖÊã¨ÔºöÈ´òÈÄÅËΩ¨„ÄÅËûçËµÑËûçÂà∏„ÄÅÊô∫ËÉΩÈü≥ÁÆ±„ÄÅÊó†‰∫∫È©æÈ©∂„ÄÅÊµÅÂ™í‰ΩìÁ≠â„ÄÇ
Êà™Ëá≥3Êúà31Êó•ÔºåÂÖ®ÂøóÁßëÊäÄËÇ°‰∏úÊà∑Êï∞14.82‰∏áÔºåËæÉ‰∏äÊúüÂ¢ûÂä†3.81%Ôºõ‰∫∫ÂùáÊµÅÈÄöËÇ°3494ËÇ°ÔºåËæÉ‰∏äÊúüÂáèÂ∞ë3.67%„ÄÇ2025Âπ¥1Êúà-3ÊúàÔºåÂÖ®ÂøóÁßëÊäÄÂÆûÁé∞Ëê•‰∏öÊî∂ÂÖ•6.20‰∫øÂÖÉÔºåÂêåÊØîÂ¢ûÈïø51.36%ÔºõÂΩíÊØçÂáÄÂà©Ê∂¶9155.20‰∏áÂÖÉÔºåÂêåÊØîÂ¢ûÈïø86.51%„ÄÇ

Êú∫ÊûÑÊåÅ‰ªìÊñπÈù¢ÔºåÊà™Ê≠¢2025Âπ¥3Êúà31Êó•ÔºåÂÖ®ÂøóÁßëÊäÄÂçÅÂ§ßÊµÅÈÄöËÇ°‰∏ú‰∏≠ÔºåÈ¶ôÊ∏Ø‰∏≠Â§ÆÁªìÁÆóÊúâÈôêÂÖ¨Âè∏‰ΩçÂ±ÖÁ¨¨‰∫åÂ§ßÊµÅÈÄöËÇ°‰∏úÔºåÊåÅËÇ°3531.42‰∏áËÇ°ÔºåÁõ∏ÊØî‰∏äÊúüÂ¢ûÂä†2169.30‰∏áËÇ°„ÄÇÂõΩËÅîÂÆâ‰∏≠ËØÅÂÖ®ÊåáÂçäÂØº‰Ωì‰∫ßÂìÅ‰∏éËÆæÂ§áETFËÅîÊé•AÔºà007300Ôºâ‰ΩçÂ±ÖÁ¨¨ÂÖ´Â§ßÊµÅÈÄöËÇ°‰∏úÔºåÊåÅËÇ°425.02‰∏áËÇ°ÔºåÁõ∏ÊØî‰∏äÊúüÂáèÂ∞ë72.70‰∏áËÇ°„ÄÇÊòìÊñπËææ‰∏≠ËØÅ‰∫∫Â∑•Êô∫ËÉΩ‰∏ªÈ¢òETFÔºà159819Ôºâ‰ΩçÂ±ÖÁ¨¨ÂçÅÂ§ßÊµÅÈÄöËÇ°‰∏úÔºåÊåÅËÇ°375.21‰∏áËÇ°Ôºå‰∏∫Êñ∞ËøõËÇ°‰∏ú„ÄÇ

author: WTVR CBS 6 Web Staff
title: First Baptist in Richmond withdraws from Southern Baptist Convention
text: RICHMOND, Va. -- Richmond's First Baptist Church will no longer be a part of the Southern Baptist Convention, the largest protestant denomination in the country. Church leaders said the decision came after a business meeting last week in response to the convention's proposed amendment requiring pastors and elders of its churches to be men. "We believe every Baptist church has the right to determine its own mission and ministry and to ordain whomever it perceives to be gifted for ministry whether male or female," First Baptist Pastor Jim Somerville said in response to the decision. First Baptist has two female pastors. ‚ÄúLynn Turner and Allison Collier have those titles, but we have a number of other female ministers on our staff," Somerville said. "We‚Äôre not giving them up either.‚Äù The decision marks the end of a 179-year-long relationship between the church and the SBC. Church leaders called the amendment "the latest illustration of a rift that has been growing" between the church and the convention since the 1980s. This is a developing story, so anyone with more information can [email newstips@wtvr.com to send a tip](mailto:newstips@wtvr.com). author: Nitin Sen
title: Bengaluru weather today: IMD issues yellow alert amid continuous rains
text:
[Karnataka News](https://www.news9live.com/state/karnataka)
Bengaluru weather today: IMD issues yellow alert amid continuous rains
Bengaluru experiences light rain and overcast skies today as IMD issues a yellow alert. Get the latest updates on weather, temperatures, and safety precautions for Bangalore.
Bengaluru: Bengaluru will experience continuous rain on Friday, according to the forecast from the Indian Meteorological Department (IMD). The department has issued a yellow alert for several districts in Karnataka, including Bengaluru Urban, Bengaluru Rural, Kolar, Chitradurga, Tumakuru, and Ramanagara. Most of these districts are expected to see a break from the rain after Friday. However, Dakshina Kannada and Udupi are forecasted to experience heavy downpours lasting until Saturday.
According to IMD, due to the low-pressure area over the southeast Bay of Bengal and on the eastern Indian Ocean, the moisture-laden winds are heading towards the state, which is the main cause of this rainfall. Most of the south-interior districts of Karnataka are thus expected to experience light to moderate rainfall.
Weather Forecast for Bengaluru
The weather forecast for the next few days in the city is generally cloudy with occasional light rain and mist. The temperature will range from a minimum of 18¬∞C to a maximum of 26¬∞C. It‚Äôs advisable to carry an umbrella and be prepared for light rain showers.
Date | Min Temp | Max Temp | Weather |
13-Dec | 19 | 25 | Generally cloudy sky with Light rain |
14-Dec | 19 | 26 | Mist |
15-Dec | 18 | 26 | Mist |
16-Dec | 18 | 26 | Mist |
17-Dec | 18 | 26 | Rain |
18-Dec | 18 | 26 | Rain |
Overcast weather conditions with spells of drizzles to moderate showers over Old Mysuru Region including Bengaluru city today üåßÔ∏è‚òî
Then another LPA in the Bay of Bengal next week could likely give rains again
[#KarnatakaRains][#BengaluruRains]‚Äî Karnataka Weather (@Bnglrweatherman)
[December 12, 2024]
IMD issues yellow alert in several districts
The Yellow alert is declared when there is potential for severe weather conditions over several days. The residents are advised to to stay updated with the latest weather forecasts and adopt necessary precautions as the area may experience flooding. The residents should avoid outdoor activities if possible, stay indoors during thunderstorms, and follow official guidelines from the local authorities.
